class_notes:
Students will investigate different forms of collaboration in this workshop. How can performers contribute to the genesis of a musical work? What does it mean to write a piece for a specific performer? How much can we blur the lines between composer and performer? The class will culminate in an event in which all are expected to participate in some capacity.
Performers and composers should come ready to create outside of their comfort zone.
course_description: Selected topics in Music. May be repeated when topic varies.
schedule_location: MW 4pm-5:15pm in BRB Performing Arts Studio
